Summary: uot side facing fredrick road..looked up saw star like object tree top level try get pic camera died red pink white lined on screen then diedcame on object was gone...
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside waiting on freinds to come over play cards..wife was letting dog get releif..facing fredrick road..iwas taking pics of a star in sky..turnedto say something to my wife..ilooked up thats when i saw it..when i first seen object i thought dang the star i have been taking pics of finaly moved and was out of its normal place..however i looked over my left shoulder it was still there...the object i was seeing was exactly like the star in the sky i have been taking pics of scince i firstnoticed it august ..31..2011....only this one instead of bein white with two white spikes of light coming fromright side and a red.blue..green light ..this object was identical accept..bigger ..and its main color not white but amber in over all color..my feelings were wow i can finaly get a close up pic.of the star ive bein wacthing..only this was a different star..i lost sight of object ..i watched ittravel east about a half mile.from my house i walked out on to fredrick road looking to folly quarter road..the object slightlyto the right of fredrick roadand folly quarter road over a feild ..it doubled in size and just like someone turning a light switch on or off it was gone dissapeared..my camera comes back on..
trends: There have been no other sightings in ellicott
This sighting has never been favorited.
